Title: Verify login with valid credentials
Steps: 1) Enter username 'standard_user' > 2) Enter password 'secret_sauce' > 3) Click Login
Expected Result: User is redirected to Inventory page (URL contains /inventory)

Title: Verify login with invalid password shows error
Steps: 1) Enter username 'standard_user' > 2) Enter password 'wrongpass' > 3) Click Login
Expected Result: Error message displayed: 'Username or password is incorrect' (generic); user remains on Login; no session

Title: Verify locked-out user cannot login
Steps: 1) Enter username 'locked_out_user' > 2) Enter password 'secret_sauce' > 3) Click Login
Expected Result: Login is rejected with message 'Sorry, this user has been locked out.'; user remains on Login; no session

Title: Verify validation for empty username and password
Steps: 1) Leave username and password empty > 2) Click Login
Expected Result: Validation message is shown; focus moves to Username field; user remains on Login
